subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Brenton Butler scored 14 of his 17 points in the second half as host Fordham beat Sacred Heart, 69-51, to end the longest losing streak in N.C.A.A. Division I at 22 games.
snippet: Brenton Butler scored 14 of his 17 points in the second half as host Fordham beat Sacred Heart, 69-51, to end the longest losing streak in N.C.A.A. Division I at 22 games.
